home.title: Werewolf Online
home.subtitle: A thrilling social deduction game where deception, teamwork, and quick thinking are your best allies. Will you hunt down the werewolves or deceive the village to victory?

strategic.title: Strategic Gameplay
strategic.description: Use deduction and deception to uncover the truth or hide in plain sight.

roles.title: Multiple Roles
roles.description: Play as a Villager, Seer, Werewolf, and many more unique characters.

cycles.title: Day & Night Cycles
cycles.description: Experience the tension of night-time hunting and daytime accusations.

1.title: Join a Game
1.description: Create a new game or join an existing one with a code.

2.title: Discover Your Role
2.description: Each player is secretly assigned a role with unique abilities.

3.title: Survive the Night
3.description: Werewolves hunt during the night while villagers sleep.

4.title: Debate & Vote
4.description: During the day, discuss and vote to eliminate suspected werewolves.

status.starting: The game is starting. You will discover your role shortly.
status.night: It's nighttime. Werewolves are choosing their victim, while the Seer and Doctor use their abilities.
status.day: It's daytime. Discuss with other villagers to identify the werewolves.
status.voting: Voting is in progress. Select a player you suspect is a werewolf.
